meanings.definition: To refuse to accept, recognize, or consider
meanings.sent1: She rejects the idea of going to the party.
meanings.sent2: He always rejects offers that are too expensive.
meanings.sent3: The cat rejects the new brand of food by turning up its nose.
meanings.sent4: The plant rejects the harsh sunlight by wilting.
meanings.sent5: The student rejects cheating as a way to pass the test.

meanings.definition: People or things that are discarded or dismissed as inferior or unacceptable
meanings.sent1: The rejects from the factory were sent for recycling.
meanings.sent2: He felt like a reject after being left out of the team.
meanings.sent3: The reject toy found a new home with a child who loved it.
meanings.sent4: The reject pile in the corner grew larger each day.
meanings.sent5: The reject box contained items waiting to be donated.
